org.terrier.compression.integer

Interface ByteIn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteFileBuffered.BufferedFileByteIn, ByteInputStream

    public interface ByteIn
    The bytewise counterpart of BitIn

    4.0
    Author:
    Matteo Catena

    • Method Detail

      • getByteOffset

        long getByteOffset()
        Returns the byte offset of the stream. It corresponds to the position of the byte in which the next bit will be written. Use only when writing
        Returns:
        the byte offset in the stream.
